gOrIputraH zaRmuKaH SaktipARiH,
krOYcArAtiH kArttikeyo viSAKaH .
skandaH svAmI tArakAriH kumAraH,
senAnIH syAdagniBUrbAhuleyaH .. 19 ..
gANgeyo brahmacArI ca guho varhiRavAhanaH .
mahAseno mahAtejAH SarajanmA ca kaTyate .. 20 ..
1.1.1.19
<LEND>

<L>199<pc>0004<k1>vizRu<k2>vizRu<vn>1.1.1.21
vizRu;
vizRuH kfzRaH keSavo maYjukeSI,
SrIvatsANkaH SrIpatiH pItavAsAH .
vizvakseno viSvarUpo murAriH,
SOriH SArNgI padmanABo mukundaH .. 21 ..
govindo DaraRiDaraH suparRaketu-
rvEkuRWo jalaSayanaScaturBujaSca .
dEtyArirmaDumaTano raTANgapARi-
rdASArhaH kratupuruzo vfzAkapiH syAt .. 22 ..
janArdanADokzajavAsudevaM dAmodaraM SrIDaramacyutaM ca .
upendramindrAvarajaM ca baBraM hariM hfzIkeSamudAharanti .. 23 ..
AtmaBUH puRqarIkAkzaH SrIvatso vizwaraSravAH .
nArAyaRo jagannATo vanamAlI gadADaraH .. 24 ..
sanAtano jinaH SamBurviDirveDA gadAgrajaH .
kEwaBArirajo jizRuH kaMsajitpuruzottamaH .. 25 ..
1.1.1.21
<LEND>

SrIvatsANkaH SrIpatiH pItavAsAH .
vizvakseno viSvarUpo murAriH,
SOriH SArNgI padmanABo mukundaH .. 21 ..
govindo DaraRiDaraH suparRaketu-
rvEkuRWo jalaSayanaScaturBujaSca .
dEtyArirmaDumaTano raTANgapARi-
rdASArhaH kratupuruzo vfzAkapiH syAt .. 22 ..
janArdanADokzajavAsudevaM dAmodaraM SrIDaramacyutaM ca .
upendramindrAvarajaM ca baBraM hariM hfzIkeSamudAharanti .. 23 ..
AtmaBUH puRqarIkAkzaH SrIvatso vizwaraSravAH .
nArAyaRo jagannATo vanamAlI gadADaraH .. 24 ..
sanAtano jinaH SamBurviDirveDA gadAgrajaH .

kAmaH SambarasUdano maDusaKaH SfNgArayoniH smftaH .. 32 ..

Aditya;

stigmAMSustaraRistaTA dinamaRirBAsvAnvivasvAnhariH .
mArtaRqastapano vikartana inaH pUzA pataNgo BagaH,
sUryo gopatiraryamA dinakaraH sUroM'SumAlI raviH .. 35 ..
mihiro virocano'rkastimiraripurdyumaRiraMSumAnaMSuH .
haridaSvaH saptASvaH praBAkaro BAnumAnBAnuH .. 36 ..
braDno haMsaH Kago mitraScitraBAnuraharpatiH .
karmasAkzI jagaccakzurdvAdaSAtmA trayItanuH .. 37 ..

parjanyo maGavA vfzA harihayaH prAcInabarhiH smftaH .. 52 ..
puruhUtaH pftanAzAw purandaraH pUrvadikpatiH svArAw .
AKaRqalasturAzAw sutrAmA gotraBitsunAsIraH .. 53 ..
SakraH syAdugraDanvA ca harivAnpAkaSAsanaH .
divaspatirviqOjASca marutvAnmeGavAhanaH .. 54 ..

<L>663<pc>0009<k1>apAMpitta<k2>apAMpitta<vn>1.1.1.62
apAMpitta;
saptArcirbahulaH SiKI hutavaho vESvAnaro'gnirvasu-
rvahnirvAyusaKaH sitetaragatiH svAhApriyaH pAvakaH .
arcizmAn jvalanaH kfSAnuranalo DUmaDvajo havyavAw,
barhirjyotiruzarbuDaSca dahanaH syAccitraBAnuH SuciH .. 62 ..
kfpIwayonirdamunAH kfzRavartmASuSukzaRiH .
viBAvasurapAMpittaM jAtavedAstanUnapAt .. 63 ..
vItihotro bfhadBAnurASrayASo DanaYjayaH .
hiraRyaretAstamoGno rohitASvo hutASanaH .. 64 ..

kuH pfTvI pfTivI sTirA ca DaraRI viSvamBarA medinI,
jyAnantA vipulA samudravasanA sarvaMsahorvI mahI .. 156 ..
kASyapI BUtaDAtrI ca ratnagarBA vasunDarA .
DarADArA ca vijYeyA tadviSezAnniboData .. 157 ..
2.1.1.156
<LEND>

kAdambarI svAdurasA ca SuRqA,
ganDottamA mADavakaSca hAlA .. 329 ..
kalyaM kaSyaM taTA madyaM mEreyaM kApiSAyanam .

nadI DunI nirJariRI ca nimnagA .
kUlaNkazA SEvalinI sarasvatI,
samudrakAntA hradinI taTApagA .. 665 ..
srotaH srotasvinI karzUH kulyA dvIpavatI sarit .
roDo vaprastu vijYeyo Bidya udDyo nadaH smftaH .. 666 ..
3.1.1.665
<LEND>

hfdyaM hAri manoharaM ca ruciraM kAntaM paraM sundaraM,
sOmyaM sADu ca valgu cAru suzamaM vAmaM SuBaM peSalam .. 689 ..
agryaM praDAnaM pramuKaM purogaM,
muKyaM parArDyaM pravaraM pravarham .
agresaraM sattamamuttamaM ca,
grAmaRyamagraRyamudAharanti .. 690 ..
4.1.1.689
<LEND>
